title: 怎么把这两个获得装备指令合到一起
author: 逍遥尊fs
txt_content:
/give @a minecraft:XXX{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"物品名字\",\"color\":\"red\"}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"介绍1\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"介绍2\",\"color\":\"green\"}"]},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:9000000000.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack}]} 1
——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
/give @p minecraft:XXX{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:XXX",lvl:Xs},{id:"minecraft:XXX",lvl:Xs},{id:"minecraft:XXX",lvl:Xs},{id:"minecraft:XXX",lvl:Xs}]
——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
上面这两个指令怎么合成一个，谢谢大佬了

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
逍遥尊fs 发表于 2019-8-13 22:13
Unbreakable:1b}如果在加这个无法破坏的指令之后放在哪
/give @a minecraft:stone{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"物品名字\",\"color\":\"red\"}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"介绍1\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"介绍2\",\"color\":\"green\"}"]},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:9000000000.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack}],Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:10}],Unbreakable:1b} 1

右下角设置最佳谢谢
